    Technology

    Scroll
    Technology

    Introducing

    The RITe™ Platform is an easy-to-take orally disintegrating tablet platform that rapidly infuses an active ingredient into the patient’s bloodstream directly through tissue in the mouth – enabling therapeutic effects within minutes.

    RITe™ tablets are smaller than a U.S. dime and disintegrate in under 3 seconds.

    Once placed between your cheek and gum, RITe™ tablets gently bind to your cheek, rapidly infusing an active ingredient into the bloodstream through the buccal tissue in your mouth.

    By delivering medications through this highly vascularized tissue, the RITe™ Platform avoids the destructive acidic environment of the GI tract and first pass metabolism, resulting in superior absorption to traditional oral pharmaceutical products.

    • Easy to take

      RITe™ tablets disintegrate rapidly, without the need for water

    • Fast action

      Effects are felt in minutes

    • Enhanced bioavailability

      Lower dose still achieves desired effects while reducing unwanted side effects

    • Durable, portable, and highly stable

      RITe™ tablets are compact, lightweight, and not sensitive to storage conditions

    The RITe™ Platform is a versatile technology that can enable a wide range of active ingredients to work quickly and efficiently in the body.

    With extremely rapid disintegration time, enhanced absorption profiles and advanced flavor masking capabilities, the RITe™ Platform can improve treatment outcomes and consumer experiences for both therapeutics and consumer products.

    We are pursuing a variety of therapeutics and products that require fast action or are currently delivered via IV/IM injection, suffer from poor oral bioavailability, and/or have increased side effects when taken orally.
